alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 10:34AM MST until January 01 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds increasing to 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Tohono O`odham Nation, Tucson Metro Area, Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Baboquivari Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Areas of blowing dust possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
